text: 34|43|nam'mute drstantannal spastamaya nilayil avarkk vayiccukelpikkappettal avar (janannaleatâ€Œ) parayum: ninnalute pitakkanmar aradhicc vannirunnatil ninn ninnale tatayuvan agrahikkunna oral matramanitâ€Œ. it ketticcamaccuntakkiya kallam matraman ennum avar parayum. tannalkk satyam vannukittiyappeal atine parri avisvasikal parannu: it spastamaya jalavidya matramakunnu
